entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
In this episode we’re going to learn what AVA is, how to set it up and after that we’ll check out a few of AVA’s features.

Resources:

  • AVA - https://github.com/avajs/ava
  • mz - https://github.com/normalize/mz
  • async/await - https://jakearchibald.com/2014/es7-async-functions/ (explanatory post)
